```{r include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(
  dev = "cairo_pdf"
)
library(ggplot2)
library(INBOtheme)
theme_set(
  theme_vlaanderen2015(
    base_family = "Calibri", # "Flanders Art Sans",
    base_size = 6, 
    transparent = "plot"
  )
)
```
